page.title: 15EVENTS
page.content: AT LEAST 4 PUPILS AT BARRY SCHOOL, WOULD LIKE TO SEE SCHOOL OPENING TIMES ALTERED TO BRING SCOTLAND INTO LINE WITH THE AMERICAN PATTERN _ ie. 7am TO 1 pm.SUCH WAS THEIR DETERMINATION THAT THEY WROTE TO THEIR MEMBER OF PARLIAMENT TO ASK HIS HELP. HE ASKED THEM TO HOLD A REFERENDUM ON THE SUBJECT BY ASKING THEIR MUMS, DADS,BROTHERS,SISTERS AND TEACHERS.IF THEY WERE ALL IN AGREEMENT THEN HE PROMISED TO TAKE THE MATTER UP WITH THOSE OFFICIALS WHO MAKE THE SCHOOL TIMETABLES. THIS ITEM WAS BROADCAST ON TELEVISION AND COVERED IN THE "COURIER".HOWEVER THE MUMS GAVE IT THE "THUMBS DOWN" AND OUR OPENING TIMES WILL REMAIN THE SAME 9am TO 3:30pm.
